The claim is based on a blog post from t: which states that the "1776 flag is presently flying atop the White House in Washington, DC" as a signal of revolution from President Trump.
The photo accompanying the blog post is: the White House deputy chief of staff, on June 1, 2019.
There is no evidence or media coverage t: star flag, symbolizing the country's founding in 1776, was flying over the White House around the time of the blog post.
The fact: checkers rate the blog post as false, indicating that the claim of the 1776 flag flying over the White House is not authentic.
